titles.title: A resolution designating Thursday, November 15, 2007, as "Feed America Thursday".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
11/14/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates Thursday, November 15, 2007, as Feed America Thursday.
Calls upon the people of the United States to sacrifice two meals on Thursday, November 15, 2007, and to donate the money that they would have spent on food to a religious or charitable organization for the purpose of feeding the hungry.
